https://tmrev.io/movie/339745-Ebar Shabor 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zdcVIudf64Ws2EQzwaS18HMjxmz.jpg Kolkata police detective Shabor Dasgupta sets out to solve the murder case of Mitali Ghosh, a woman with a messy past. Her ex-husband Mithu Mitra, ex-boyfriend Pantu and friend Samiran are the prime suspects and so is her cousin Joyeeta. His investigation reveals a complex web of relationships gone sour that gives almost everyone a good motive. Ebar Shabor
